com.intersys.globals.graphapi
Interface Graph<TNode extends GraphNode>

Type Parameters:
TNode - is the data type to be used as a Node in the graph
All Superinterfaces:
java.util.Collection<TNode>, java.lang.Iterable<TNode>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GlGraph
public interface Graph<TNode extends GraphNode>
extends java.util.Collection<TNode>

Graph presents a collection of graph nodes but also has an attached list of edges among those nodes

Field Summary
static java.lang.String UnitsLabel
          Label the units of each edge in the graph with this String.

Field Detail

UnitsLabel

static final java.lang.String UnitsLabel
Label the units of each edge in the graph with this String. Note is it invalid for edges in a graph to have different units.

boolean isAddNodesWithEdges()
